response.original_title: Hikari 輝いてブルースカイ/青空ひかり
response.overview: The lead role of this work is Hikari Aozora! !! An orthodox beautiful girl with beautiful smooth hair and a dazzling smile! !! The expression filled with bright lights like the sun shining in the clear blue soothes the viewer. With a cheerful personality that she doesn't know, the shooting scene was very exciting, and her special skill, karate, was suddenly recorded in the main story! !! The dignified and cute appearance of Hikari-chan, who will be unveiled for the first time in Japan and show off her full-scale model, is super rare! !! Approximately one year after the industry debut, the shooting response is outstanding if you want to see the facial expressions of grown-ups! !! A neat and cute figure, a bewitching and sexy figure, a dignified and cool figure ... There must be Hikari-chan you don't know yet! !!
response.title: Hikari: Sparkling Blue Sky Hikari Aozora
